text:
Great point <@U02A25BJ4T1>.  I totally agree, but the reason we're localising it is because our product only works in Australia and for locals. So that's why I'm trying to figure out how I can reach freelancers specifically in that area.

<@UL2E0QVB3> :wave:

<@U02AR2XSN1M> some solid tips in there, thank you! We do bank accounts for sole traders. As you probably know, the big four in australia are pretty terrible for freelancers so we're building something better. The product is genuinely awesome and as a freelancer myself I know I would love it. I like what you're saying about being AUS specific. And totally agree about cross pollination. I've found a few communities/groups that I think would be useful but I'd love to hear which ones are most useful from freelancers themselves. Do you know any groups/brands that you'd say AUS freelancers are very in touch with?
